it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.islands.IslandPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
JavaFXRescalable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class IslandPane extends RescalableAnchorPane
Class IslandPane represent the rescalable pane for an Island
